content.content:
CREATE TABLE tags
(
    Id            INTEGER          not null
        primary key,
    TagName       TEXT null,
    Count         INTEGER          null,
    ExcerptPostId INTEGER          null,
    WikiPostId    INTEGER          null,
    foreign key (ExcerptPostId) references posts (Id)
        on update cascade on delete cascade
);

tool_use_result.stdout:

        primary key,

    ExcerptPostId INTEGER          null,
    WikiPostId    INTEGER          null,
    foreign key (ExcerptPostId) references posts (Id)
        on update cascade on delete cascade
);

content.content:
CREATE TABLE posts
(
    Id                    INTEGER          not null UNIQUE
        primary key,
    PostTypeId            INTEGER          null,
    AcceptedAnswerId      INTEGER          null,
    CreaionDate           DATETIME     null,
    Score                 INTEGER          null,
    ViewCount             INTEGER          null,
    Body                  TEXT     null,
    OwnerUserId           INTEGER          null,
    LasActivityDate       DATETIME     null,
    Title                 TEXT null,
    Tags                  TEXT null,
    AnswerCount           INTEGER          null,
    CommentCount          INTEGER          null,
    FavoriteCount         INTEGER          null,
    LastEditorUserId      INTEGER          null,
    LastEditDate          DATETIME     null,
    CommunityOwnedDate    DATETIME    null,
    ParentId              INTEGER          null,
    ClosedDate            DATETIME     null,
    OwnerDisplayName      TEXT null,
    LastEditorDisplayName TEXT null,
        foreign key (LastEditorUserId) references users (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade,
        foreign key (OwnerUserId) references users (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade,
        foreign key (ParentId) references posts (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade
);

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/codebase_community.sqlite" "SELECT t.ExcerptPostId, p.OwnerUserId, u.DisplayName, u.Location FROM tags t JOIN posts p ON t.ExcerptPostId = p.Id JOIN users u ON p.OwnerUserId = u.Id WHERE t.TagName = 'hypothesis-testing';"
input.description: Find the owner of the excerpt post with hypothesis-testing tag

content.text:
The query shows that:
- The excerpt post for the `hypothesis-testing` tag has `ExcerptPostId = 3019`
- The owner (`OwnerUserId = 88`) has `DisplayName = "mbq"` and `Location = "Warsaw, Poland"`

The claim states the owner is "Gerry" based in "Toronto, Canada", but the data shows the owner is "mbq" based in "Warsaw, Poland". Both the name and the location are wrong.

```json
{"label": "CONTRADICTED", "reasoning": "The excerpt post for the 'hypothesis-testing' tag (ExcerptPostId=3019) is owned by user 88, whose DisplayName is 'mbq' and Location is 'Warsaw, Poland'. The claim states the owner is 'Gerry' based in 'Toronto, Canada', which contradicts the data on both the name and the location."}
```
